mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT cs.UI_student_no FROM COMMUNITY_SERVICE cs WHERE cs.CB_no = cb.CB_no) AS 'student_no', (SELECT AES_DECRYPT(FROM_BASE64(UI_name), '${encryptionKey}') FROM USER_INFO WHERE UI_student_no = student_no) AS 'writer', cb.CB_no, cb.CB_title, cb.CB_cr_date FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD cb WHERE cb.CB_delete_T_F = false AND cb.CB_topic = ${topic} ORDER BY cb.CB_no DESC LIMIT ${limit_start}, ${limit_end}
